term: Who does Washington side with and why?
content:
washington sides with hamilton
he says that we are militarily feeble, economically wobbly, and politically disunited
we barely got out of the war with britain last time
he says that we are not in the position to go back to war with britain
if we can wait a generation and wait for it to pass by, we would be fine
	this is true; by 1812 we are good and alright to do things like that
